column4: Hey, I just installed 8.10 on a system and I'm getting /dev/sda1 does not exist, dropping to shell. Any hints? The install went fine, the live CD runs fine, and I was just running arch on this same machine for months.
Ubuntu is starting to piss me off more and more with each release. Seems like I have many more issues than I used to.
and here is a good place to solve them, ask and get answers
